thread.title: Report: Bannon, Pence Deliver Different Messages About Trump’s EU Policies
thread.title_full: Report: Bannon, Pence Deliver Different Messages About Trump’s EU Policies

author: Fred Maxwell
title: Report: Bannon, Pence Deliver Different Messages About Trump’s EU Policies
text:
Comedian Likens Trump’s Election To Rape, Makes Crude Joke About First Lady 
An official at the White House confirmed to Reuters the meeting took place, but claims the information given by the anonymous sources were inaccurate. 
“They only spoke for about three minutes and it was just a quick hello,” the official told Reuters. 
The sources also told Reuters that Bannon’s meeting with the ambassador is reminiscent of a message he delivered in 2014 while he was the head of Breitbart News. Advertisement – story continues below 
In his 2014 message to a Vatican conference, Bannon remarked that Western Europe was grounded in “strong nationalist movements,” adding, “I think it’s what can see us forward.” 
In response to calls from French Foreign Minister Jean-Marc Ayrault and the chairman of the Munich Security Conference, Wolfgang Ischinger, seeking assurance the U.S is still committed to the EU, Pence traveled to Brussels over the weekend in an effort to provide assurance to the allies. 
Speaking in Brussels on Sunday, the vice-president said, “President Trump and I look forward to working together with you and the European Union to deepen our political and economic partnership.” Advertisement - story continues below
